text: Hi how are you?
I am great!  How about you?
I'm ok...been a very hot day...glad to be inside.  Do you have time for me to tell you about a charity I like?
I sure do!
Great.  I like this charity called Save the Children.  Have you heard of them?
I think that I have seen ads on tv for it.  It helps impoverished children in developing countries, I believe.
Yes they help children in developing countries with a lot of different things.   It's surprising how much less these children have.
Yes, I think they do a lot of good.  Do you donate to them?
I do donate to them.  Do you donate to any charities?
I donate occasionally.  I did last year after the devastating hurricanes that hit the south.  Houston, specifically.
Yeah I always have certain charities that speak to me.  You are able to donate a portion of your earning from this to Save the Children if they interest you.
Hmm, I am not sure if I will do that.  It is tough to know if a little bit would make any difference.
Any little bit helps...if everyone gives even 10 cents, that adds up.
What would you do?
I like to donate a little bit when I'm asked.  Especially since it's tax deductible.
That is good to know!  I do forget that I can deduct charitable contributions.  I am thinking I may donate a little.
Yeah and making small donations throughout the year adds up...makes a good tax deduction.
Okay, then.  I believe that I will donate ten cents.
That's great!  You can always read up on them to see where your donation will go.  Over 80% of it goes directly to helping the children.
Thank you for your suggestion!  I am happy to support a good cause, and 80% seems like a pretty substantial portion of the actual pool of donations.
